Container.Name: machinebox-tagbox
Container.Overview: Tagbox lets you identify the content of images by getting a list of ordered tags.
Container.Description: Tagbox lets you identify the content of images by getting a list of ordered tags.

Config.Name: MB_PORT
Config.Description: (string) Defaults to 8080 - Port where the service will listen.

Config.Name: MB_ADDRESS
Config.Description: (string) Defaults to 0.0.0.0 - Address where the service will listen.

Config.Name: MB_TAGBOX_READ_ONLY
Config.Description: (bool) Defaults to false - If true Tagbox will be read only. Teaching and updating state will be disabled. Be sure to provide MB_TAGBOX_STATE_URL to set the initial state, otherwise the box will be useless.

Config.Name: MB_DOWNLOAD_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
Config.Description: (integer) Default to 60. Timeout in seconds that Tagbox will use when it downloads files, for example to download the state file.

Config.Name: API_KEY
Config.Description: Container Variable: MB_KEY Get one here https://machinebox.io/login

Config.Name: MB_DISABLE_CORS
Config.Description: (bool) Defaults to false - If true will turn off CORS support for the box.

Config.Name: MB_BASICAUTH_USER
Config.Description: (string) The Basic Authentication username and password that every request must use. Recommended for sitautions where the boxes are publicly accessible.

Config.Name: MB_TAGBOX_STATE_URL
Config.Description: (string) URL to a .tagbox state file to initialize the box with. Useful for spinning up many instances of Tagbox with the same state.

Config.Name: MB_TAGBOX_STATE_POLL_SECONDS
Config.Description: (integer) Default to 0 (No polling). If this variable is set, Tagbox would poll the MB_TAGBOX_STATE_URL for changes on the file, based on the ETag or Last-Modified http headers. If the file changes Tagbox will download the new file and update the state of the teaching. This variable is useful for updating multiple running instances of Tagbox.

Config.Name: MB_TAGBOX_INDEX_REFRESH_SECONDS
Config.Description: (integer) Defaults to 2 - Number of seconds that Tagbox will wait to update the index for new data, or changes in the data. Tagbox will accumulate changes to perform an update on the search index, because changes are an expensive operation, with this variable you can adjust the time interval for that operation.
